subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patrick Kane scored the tiebreaking goal with 3 minutes 45 seconds to play, and the Chicago Blackhawks forced a decisive seventh game in the Western Conference finals with a 4-3 win over the host Los Angeles Kings on Friday.
snippet: Patrick Kane scored the tiebreaking goal with 3 minutes 45 seconds to play, and the Chicago Blackhawks forced a decisive seventh game in the Western Conference finals with a 4-3 win over the host Los Angeles Kings on Friday.
